>
[Immovable Potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2087)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you drink the thick, slate-colored _immovable potion_, you become anchored in place, even defying gravity, rendering you [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 minute or until you Dismiss the activation. While you are immobilized this way, the DC to move you from your place, including knocking you [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), is 40.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
